articles.description: The departure of Peloton founder John Foley as the company's CEO raises a question the market has struggled to answer: when should a founder step aside?
articles.content:
Roughly two months after Peloton's IPO, founder John Foley appeared on CNBC's "Closing Bell" where he touted the "predictability of the revenue" of the connected fitness company.

articles.description: Both the Tesla Model 3 and Hyundai Santa Cruz were badly damaged in the crash
articles.content: A Tesla and a Hyundai Santa Cruz were both badly damaged during a serious crash in Cincinnati earlier this month. Dashcam footage shared online shows the accident, although you will have to look well… [+1347 chars]

articles.author: John Melloy
articles.title: Goldman lowers official S&P 500 forecast and also evaluates what a recession would do to stocks - CNBC
articles.description: Goldman Sachs cut its target for the S&P 500 over the weekend citing higher rates crimping valuations.

articles.title: Billionaire Soros buys stake in EV startup Rivian - Reuters
articles.description: Billionaire investor George Soros bought nearly 20 million shares of electric truck startup Rivian Automotive Inc (RIVN.O) in the quarter ended Dec. 31, securities filings showed Friday.
